The Razer Book 13 (2020) is an ultrabook introduced in late 2020. It features a 13.4" screen (UHD or FullHD), 11th-gen Intel Core processors (i5 or i7) and integrated Intel Iris Xe graphics.

sections.title: Firmware
sections.content: Razer is not participating in fwupd. Which means that firmware updates must be done using Windows.

sections.title: Audio
sections.content: This laptop requires Sound Open Firmware in order for the soundcard to work.

sections.title: Keyboard
sections.content: Keyboard lighting effects can be controlled using openrazer-meta-gitAUR. For more information visit Razer peripherals.
